name: Starpiercer
description:
You are a trans-galactic ripper assigned on an ambitious mission of haunting down a dangerous race of intelligent machines. These vicious droids invented an ultimate weapon to swiftly destroy our world and it's your duty to stop this aggressive intrusion. Smash them all! Just beware of their deadly missiles...

Controls:

W or ↑ - Go up
S or ↓ - Go down
Space - Dash
E - Use bonus (if caught)

Disclaimer: this game is currently in an alpha stage, we keep on adding more features. Windows/ OS X/ Linux builds coming soon!

For feedback, improvement suggestions, or partnership, please, contact us at:

schrodinger.team (at) gmail.com
